This application lets you engage with our interactive gardens in a whole new way. I would like to invite you to take a tour through application with me.
The locations button takes you to the next screen, a list of interactive places supported by this app.
The map button displays the locations of all interactive places supported by this app.
If you don\'t need this guide, you can use the Help section to turn if off. This menu will also allow you to run the guide again or select a specific part you\'d like to re-run.
In order to interact with the location you are currently in, please select its name from the list.
This screen is used to interact with the location. When you press next, the application will start to play music and listen for signals coming from transmitters located throughout this location.

This object will show you the current status of the scanner. It will tell you when the app is scanning or whether music is playing or paused. It also tells you when you have found all of the transmitters for your current location.
Use this button to stop current sounds or replay last track. A dark background indicates that button is currently disabled and cannot be used. A blue background means the button is enabled.
Use this button to pause or play the current sound.
When the scanner indicates that there are no more transmitters to scan in this location, you can use this button to reset the app and go around the location once again.
These same controls can be found in the notification bar and are displayed if you pull your notification bar down, when the application is running in the background or when the device is locked.
